SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: A lists of hostnames that the server will respond to. A good starter is 'yourappname.herokuapp.com'

CCC_PASS.description: The WPI CCC password. LDAP returns info more reliably with this.

CAS_SERVER_URL.description: The CAS server to use, if any. Note that many CAS servers run on a whitelist.

USE_WHITENOISE.description: Host static files via django. Unless you're running a separate server in front of this (cough, userweb), you want this.

DEBUG.description: Sets debug mode on/off for the site. If enabled, insecure (but soooo convenient...)
